div.p: (a) Interdecadal Pacific Oscillation index (black) between 1984 and 2015 plotted alongside time series of the first maximum covariance analysis (MCA) mode indices for low‐cloud cover (blue), sea surface temperature (red), and the first empirical orthogonal function (EOF) of estimated inversion strength (inverted, cyan). A 12‐month moving average is applied to all indices. (b) Similar to (a), but for Atlantic Multidecadal Oscillation index and the second MCA/EOF modes.
